title: Longhorns Daily News : Texas WBB is No . 1 in the latest AP Poll for first time in two decades
body_text:
The Texas Longhorns women’s basketball team pulled into the latest AP Poll’s No. 1 overall spot this week. It’s the first time in 21 years that Texas women’s basketball has pulled off a top overall AP Poll ranking.
Longhorns Daily News: Texas WBB is No. 1 in the latest AP Poll for first time in two decades
Plus: In fact, it’s been 21 years since Texas WBB’s last No. 1 AP Poll ranking
As ESPN noted, it’s been a minute since the Texas women’s squad has pulled off this exact feat.
